text:
HAPPY SUNDAY!
Tune into @WTNH from 6-8am to learn about more social media crackdowns after the #CapitolRiots.  Also, CT is rolling out phase 1B of the #COVID19 #vaccine - who will get the shot.  And @GarettArgianas is here for @Ash_Baylor with a forecast full of ☀️☀️☀️.  Join us! https://t.co/Q4XepclCDc
